SummaryEnglish: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

1.SummaryEnglish: Joe meets and falls in love with Beck and goes down a social-media rabbit hole to learn everything about her. While this may be a real shot at real love, there are some things standing in the way, such as her ex, Benji.

2.TitleEnglish: The Last Nice Guy in New York
2.SummaryEnglish: Beck and Joe have a real date. Joe does everything he can to win Beck over, but she's still stuck on Benji.

3.SummaryEnglish: Beck isn't certain that Joe is 'The One', so he sets out to prove he's boyfriend material.

4.SummaryEnglish: Beck heads out of town to rendezvous with the man she's been texting. Joe follows and is shocked by what he finds. Beck realizes she and Joe are going to have to bring a scary level of truth and authenticity to their connection.

5.SummaryEnglish: Joe and Beck's fledgling relationship is tested by the increasingly intrusive meddling of Beck's friend. Joe does everything in his power to solve his problem without making a mess.

6.SummaryEnglish: Joe's devotion to Beck takes him to a lavish but eerily remote summer home and a face-to-face encounter with an equally obsessed adversary who is just as intent on possessing her heart.

7.SummaryEnglish: Beck suffers a loss and Joe is right there with a shoulder to lean on. But he can't quite shake the worry and jealousy he still feels.

8.SummaryEnglish: Joe and Beck's lives have taken very different turns. A chance encounter brings every possibility to the surface and they must decide which way their want their story to go.

9.SummaryEnglish: Beck can't shake the feeling that there's more to the story of Joe's lost former love. Determined to find out the truth, it's Beck's turn to go to shocking lengths to dig up the truth on Joe.

10.SummaryEnglish: Beck's deepest truths are revealed. Joe pushes the limits of what he'll do for love.

1.SummaryEnglish: Joe— now 'Will'—arrives in his own personal hell on Earth: LA. He's trying to go straight, but the past doesn’t always leave well enough alone.

2.SummaryEnglish: Joe realizes Will Bettelheim isn’t all he’s cracked up to be. The fallout threatens to get in the way of his burgeoning connection with Love.

3.SummaryEnglish: Joe attempts to keep things platonic with Love and keep his nose out of Ellie's business, but his instincts soon get the better of him.

4.TitleEnglish: The Good, the Bad & the Hendy
4.SummaryEnglish: As he tries to adapt to sharing Love with Forty, Joe is caught off guard by a group date—and his protectiveness of Ellie quickly escalates.

5.SummaryEnglish: Love brings Joe to a wellness weekend, where he gets a good look at her family's dynamic. Forty’s surprise guest has him feeling anything but zen.

6.SummaryEnglish: Joe performs surveillance on a potential problem, but suspects someone might be tailing him, too. Painful memories put Love on edge about the present.

7.SummaryEnglish: To soothe heartache, Joe turns to ancient remedies, modern technology and drinking with Delilah. One small slip-up could have major consequences.

8.TitleEnglish: Fear and Loathing in Beverly Hills
8.SummaryEnglish: Joe wants to get away, but Forty insists they finish their script. As pressure mounts, Forty’s excessive coping devices make for a harrowing night.

9.SummaryEnglish: As Love looks after an increasingly skittish Ellie, Joe tries to reconstruct the events of a trippy evening—but finds the truth to be elusive.

10.SummaryEnglish: Joe has always been full of surprises, but Love has a few of her own. Is this the beginning of the end, or the end of the deceiving?

1.TitleEnglish: And They Lived Happily Ever After
1.SummaryEnglish: After a delivery room surprise, new dad Joe struggles to connect with his infant child, but he has no trouble at all fostering a new infatuation.

2.TitleEnglish: So I Married an Axe Murderer
2.SummaryEnglish: Joe and Love try couples therapy, but their issues may need more than counselling—and their friction isn't the only thing they need to make disappear.

3.SummaryEnglish: Love grows apprehensive as media scrutiny intensifies next door. An acute sickness in the family drudges up old memories—and worse—for Joe.

4.SummaryEnglish: An impulsive retaliation by Love lands her and Joe in a bind. Though Joe seeks a different way out than usual, it proves to be a tall order.

5.SummaryEnglish: Joe begrudgingly goes on a hunting trip with some other local husbands. Love tries to manage her burgeoning relationship with Theo.

6.SummaryEnglish: As her mother launches a new venture, Love grows increasingly concerned about a potential big change herself. Joe has a breakthrough in self-awareness.

7.SummaryEnglish: While Dottie spirals into emotional turmoil, Love tries to get intel on Matthew's investigation. Joe sets his sights on derailing Marienne's ex.

8.SummaryEnglish: Joe selfishly tries to coerce Love into a lifestyle change, but things go south quickly. Theo discovers just how deep Matthew's obsession goes.

9.SummaryEnglish: Love tends to some unexpected long-term guests. Joe decides to take a drastic step to get what he wants the most.

10.SummaryEnglish: News permeates the community about a recent murder. Joe looks toward a future with Marienne—but hell hath no fury like Love scorned.

1.SummaryEnglish: Now living in London, Joe tries to lay low and resist old habits... until he's forced to tie up loose ends and bond with a circle of wealthy socialites.

2.SummaryEnglish: Joe leans on his skills - and a student's insights - to catch his stalker. An art show offers a gallery of suspects, revealing more than the eye can see.

3.SummaryEnglish: As news of a killer targeting the rich swirls, Joe's stalker inches dangerously close to the truth. Joe's efforts to protect Kate take a dark turn.

4.SummaryEnglish: A ritzy weekend getaway doubles as a chance for Joe to hunt down his elusive stalker. Without cell service or Wi-Fi, Joe makes a key connection.

5.SummaryEnglish: While falling back into familiar patterns, Joe gets caught up in an unfortunate game as everyone's plans go up in flames.

6.SummaryEnglish: In the aftermath of the murders, Joe searches for a scapegoat and Rhys pursues his grand ambitions while Kate and Phoebe assert their independence.

7.SummaryEnglish: The tables turn for Joe when an influential figure comes to town with a tempting offer as Nadia follows a hunch.

8.TitleEnglish: Where Are You Going, Where Have You Been?
8.SummaryEnglish: As memories of the past trickle in, Joe struggles to recall an important detail. Phoebe shares her hasty plans with Kate. Nadia scrambles for a solution.

9.SummaryEnglish: Torn between his dark side and good intentions, Joe works to right his wrongs. After attempting to help Phoebe, Kate faces her father — and hard truths.

10.SummaryEnglish: With love and loss weighing heavily on his mind, Joe commits a final act in hopes of never walking down the same path again.

1.SummaryEnglish: Joe and Kate settle in New York with a pledge to start over, but their headline-making marriage hits a snag when betrayal strikes close to home.

2.SummaryEnglish: A family dinner descends into chaos when Kate's sister Reagan makes a shocking allegation. Bronte's curiosity lands her in a tight spot.

3.SummaryEnglish: Joe hits an impasse in Mooney's basement, as tension builds at home. Kate plays hardball to protect Henry. Bronte faces exposure at a literary salon.

4.SummaryEnglish: A game-changing announcement at Lockwood Corporation sets off alarm bells for Kate. An unwelcome guest crashes Mooney's grand reopening.

5.SummaryEnglish: Fueled by fear, Kate finds answers from a troubled source. A puzzling note at work sends Joe on a search for the whereabouts of a missing person.

6.SummaryEnglish: A viral video complicates Joe's dreams of a fresh start — and forces Bronte to question her loyalties. Kate makes changes at home.

7.SummaryEnglish: As faces from his past resurface, the "most visible man in New York" must sway the court of public opinion.

8.SummaryEnglish: With their relationship at a crossroads, Joe gives Bronte a gift to test her commitment. Kate finds a shoulder to lean on.

9.SummaryEnglish: Joe must use all his talents to liberate himself from the Lockwoods' financial grip. Kate tries a dose of deception to achieve her goal.

10.SummaryEnglish: Hoping to decisively close the book on the past, Joe embarks on a risky new chapter. But as with every great story, one last twist awaits.
